content.1: In the year that Tartan came unto Ashdod, (when Sargon the king of Assyria sent him,) and fought against Ashdod, and took it;

content.4: So shall the king of Assyria lead away the Egyptians prisoners, and the Ethiopians captives, young and old, naked and barefoot, even with
content.5: And they shall be afraid and ashamed of Ethiopia their expectation, and of Egypt their glory.
